Text: NRSC event letterKen Lay Letterdoc A very rough draftTake a look and let me know you thoughtsWe should include Sen Hutchinson in the letter as soos as she is confirmedThanks for all you help with securing Dec Chip Ken Lay Letterdoc

Texas listTake a look and let me know what I need to doWe are ready to FedEx letters from Sen Frist re the eventPerhaps we should have Mr Lay send a letter early in the week and then do a follow up letter from Sen FristWe can follow up with some phone calls from Haley Barbour and Sen Frist to key peopleDo you think Mr Lay will have some time to work the phones I know this is been a rough spot for yall but I appreciate all your helpAs a small Enron shareholder I appreciate your hard work Chip
